name: barefaced
content:
barefaced adjective
(WITHOUT SHAME)
Add to word list
Add to word list
disapproving not showing any shame about, or trying to hide, your bad behaviour: That's a barefaced lie! He's selling influence. The man's quite barefaced about it.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was the most barefaced liar I'd ever seen.It is barefaced cheek to suggest we caused this problem ourselves.This is barefaced hypocrisy.How does he make so barefaced a lie appear to be a truth? This is one of the most barefaced acts of historical rewriting ever.
